<info added on 2025-07-01T07:01:13.936Z>
## Version Requirements for Project Setup

**Latest Stable Versions (December 2024):**
- Next.js: 15.1 (supports React 19, improved error debugging, new APIs)
- Tailwind CSS: 3.4.x (current stable version)
- Magic UI: 1.x (latest stable version)
- TypeScript: 5.5.x
- ESLint: 9.x (compatible with Next.js 15)
- Prettier: 3.x

**Recommended Installation Commands:**
```bash
npx create-next-app@latest polyburg-landing
npm install tailwindcss@latest
npm install magic-ui@latest
npm install typescript@latest
npm install eslint@latest
npm install prettier@latest
```

**Example package.json Dependencies:**
```json
{
  "dependencies": {
    "next": "^15.1.0",
    "react": "^19.0.0",
    "react-dom": "^19.0.0",
    "tailwindcss": "^3.4.0",
    "magic-ui": "^1.0.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "typescript": "^5.5.0",
    "eslint": "^9.0.0",
    "prettier": "^3.0.0"
  }
}
```
